title: Herbal Pharmacy/Wellness Shoppe
description: NorthShore is an integrated healthcare delivery system including Evanston, Glenbrook, Highland Park and Skokie Hospitals, a Medical Group, Research Institute, Home Health Services and Foundation. We are located in the northern Chicago suburbs.
cleaned_text: The Wellness Shoppe at our Park Center clinic has a staff of formally-trained wellness specialists, certified nutritionists and herbalists. The shoppe features quality products that have been carefully selected by our team of Integrative Medicine physicians and practitioners. We offer a full selection of high-quality vitamins, herbs, supplements, natural body care products, essential oils, educational materials and gift items. You will also find a selection of healthy drinks, foods and snacks specifically chosen based on their organic, fair trade, and ethically processed certification. We combine ancient wisdom and evidence based modern medicine to provide high quality products that promote health and well-being. The brands we carry have been researched by the Integrative Medicine team and are found to adhere to manufacturing practices as outlined by the pharmaceutical industry. This allows us and our patients to have confidence in our products. In addition, our products are continually evaluated and updated according to the latest research. The Wellness Shoppe staff is friendly, caring and supportive. We will provide you with the utmost care and attention. We are here to help you understand the how's and why's and offer professional guidance in choosing the best companies and the right combinations for your specific health needs. We recognize that everyone is unique and we care about helping you achieve your health and wellness goals. The Wellness Shoppe is Open Monday through Friday 9 a.m. to 4 p.m. For your convenience we offer $10 flat rate shipping or pre-paid order pick up after hours, Monday through Thursday until 6 p.m. and Saturdays from 8 a.m. to 1 p.m. Curbside is still available during regular Wellness Shoppe hours. Call us for more information
